title: U.S. inflation threat spooks global markets
text:
U.S. inflation threat spooks global markets 6:51am EST - 01:58 
Stock markets were routed around the globe on Monday, with European indexes opening lower and bond yields rising as resurgent U.S. inflation raised the possibility central banks would tighten policy more aggressively than had been expected. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Stock markets were routed around the globe on Monday, with European indexes opening lower and bond yields rising as resurgent U.S. inflation raised the possibility central banks would tighten policy more aggressively than had been expected.
